content: Please, correct me if I’m wrong — I’d love to hear from those of you who feel amazing at what you do, always, and then I’ll cry myself to sleep in a midday Prosecco nap. However, for the majority of us, our main goal shouldn’t be perfection. It should only be to keep trying and to keep recognizing the ways in which we judge ourselves. We don’t actually know if our stuff sucks — we only think it does. And if you’re working from home with only your own thoughts most of the day, those thoughts can be destructive and seduce you into doing the last thing you should ever do: quit.
